text: Joseph Ronald "Ronnie" Dunam Drew (16 September, 1934 - 16 August, 2008) was an Irish folk singer and country singer. He was born in Londonderry, Ireland in 1934. Ronnie was best known for his long beard and voice, he was also named the Irish Santa Clause by friends. And Celtic Clause to others. Category:1934 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Musicians from Northern Ireland Category:Folk singers Category:People from County Londonderry
title: Ronnie Drew
